languages.text: "А, чтоб тебя!" {n}Женщина отчаянно трет виски.{/n} "В-ваша Светлость. Дело такое. Я пыталась прозреть ближайшее будущее, и меня так шибануло... до сих пор в голове гудит. Что-то очень странное надвигается, да не разобрать никак, что именно. Одно только слово ясно слышу — "рассвет". Или, может, "восход"... И оно бьется, бьется, как эхо, как колокол... Но разве бывает такой мрак на рассвете?"

"Damn it!" {n}Idira presses her fingers to her temples in desperation.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Here's the thing. I was trying to see the immediate future, and it hit me so hard... my head is still spinning. Something very strange is heading our way, and I can't make out what it is, no matter how hard I try. A single word is all I can make out: 'daybreak.' Or maybe it's 'dawn'... And it's ringing and ringing like an echo, like a bell... But if it's daybreak, then why is it so dark?"
languages.original_text: "А, чтоб тебя!" {n}Женщина отчаянно трет виски.{/n} "В-ваша Светлость. Дело такое. Я пыталась прозреть ближайшее будущее, и меня так шибануло... до сих пор в голове гудит. Что-то очень странное надвигается, да не разобрать никак, что именно. Одно только слово ясно слышу — "рассвет". Или, может, "восход"... И оно бьется, бьется, как эхо, как колокол... Но разве бывает такой мрак на рассвете?"

A single word is all I can make out: 'daybreak.' Or maybe it's 'dawn'... And it's ringing and ringing like an echo, like a bell... But if it's daybreak, then why is it so dark?"

languages.text: “该死！”{n}伊迪拉的手指拼命按着太阳穴。{/n}“大……大人，是这么回事。我刚刚正在试图预知不远的未来，但它却狠狠地击中了我……我的头到现在还嗡嗡响。某个非常古怪的东西正朝我们走来，无论我怎么努力，都看不清那究竟是什么。我只能说出‘黎明’这个词，也可能是‘破晓’……总之，这个词就像回声一样，一直回荡在我耳边，就像钟声一样……可如果这真的是什么‘黎明’，怎么会一片漆黑？”
languages.original_text: "Damn it!" {n}Idira presses her fingers to her temples in desperation.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Here's the thing. I was trying to see the immediate future, and it hit me so hard... my head is still spinning. Something very strange is heading our way, and I can't make out what it is, no matter how hard I try. A single word is all I can make out: 'daybreak.' Or maybe it's 'dawn'... And it's ringing and ringing like an echo, like a bell... But if it's daybreak, then why is it so dark?"

traits.locale_text: “该死！”{n}伊迪拉的手指拼命按着太阳穴。{/n}“大……大人，是这么回事。我刚刚正在试图预知不远的未来，但它却狠狠地击中了我……我的头到现在还嗡嗡响。某个非常古怪的东西正朝我们走来，无论我怎么努力，都看不清那究竟是什么。我只能说出‘黎明’这个词，也可能是‘破晓’……总之，这个词就像回声一样，一直回荡在我耳边，就像钟声一样……”

languages.text: 「くそっ！」{n}イディラは切羽詰まったようにこめかみを指で押さえる。{/n}「へ、陛下。こういうことなの。目の前の未来を見ようとして、大きな衝撃を受けて…まだ頭がクラクラしているわ。とても奇妙な何かが私たちの方に向かっていて、それが何なのか、どう頑張ってもわからない。私が聞き取れるのは、たったひとつの言葉だけ。それが「夜明け」。あるいは「暁」かもしれない。そしてそれは、鐘の残響のように鳴り響いている…でも、なぜ夜明けがこんなに暗いのだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Damn it!" {n}Idira presses her fingers to her temples in desperation.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Here's the thing. I was trying to see the immediate future, and it hit me so hard... my head is still spinning. Something very strange is heading our way, and I can't make out what it is, no matter how hard I try. A single word is all I can make out: 'daybreak.' Or maybe it's 'dawn'... And it's ringing and ringing like an echo, like a bell... But if it's daybreak, then why is it so dark?"

traits.locale_text: 「くそっ！」{n}イディラは切羽詰まったようにこめかみを指で押さえる。{/n}「へ、｛mf|陛下|陛下｝。こういうことなの。目の前の未来を見ようとして、大きな衝撃を受けて…まだ頭がクラクラしているわ。とても奇妙な何かが私たちの方に向かっていて、それが何なのか、どう頑張ってもわからない。私が聞き取れるのは、たったひとつの言葉だけ。それが「夜明け」。あるいは「暁」かもしれない。そしてそれは、鐘の残響のように鳴り響いている…でも、なぜ夜明けがこんなに暗いのだろう？」

languages.text: "Verdammt!" {n}Idira presst verzweifelt ihre Finger gegen die Schläfen.{/n} "E-Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Sache ist die: Ich habe versucht, in die unmittelbare Zukunft zu sehen, und es traf mich wie ein Schlag ... in meinem Kopf dreht sich immer noch alles. Etwas sehr Seltsames kommt auf uns zu, und ich erkenne nicht, was es ist, so sehr ich mich auch bemühe. Da ist nur ein einziges Wort: 'Tagesanbruch.' Oder vielleicht auch 'Dämmerung' ... Und es hallt ständig wider wie ein Echo oder eine Glocke ... Aber wenn es Tagesanbruch ist, warum ist es dann so dunkel?"
languages.original_text: "Damn it!" {n}Idira presses her fingers to her temples in desperation.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Here's the thing. I was trying to see the immediate future, and it hit me so hard... my head is still spinning. Something very strange is heading our way, and I can't make out what it is, no matter how hard I try. A single word is all I can make out: 'daybreak.' Or maybe it's 'dawn'... And it's ringing and ringing like an echo, like a bell... But if it's daybreak, then why is it so dark?"

traits.locale_text: "Verdammt!" {n}Idira presst verzweifelt ihre Finger gegen die Schläfen.{/n} "E-Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Sache ist die: Ich habe versucht, in die unmittelbare Zukunft zu sehen, und es traf mich wie ein Schlag ... in meinem Kopf dreht sich immer noch alles. Etwas sehr Seltsames kommt auf uns zu, und ich erkenne nicht, was, sosehr ich mich auch bemühe. Da ist nur ein einziges Wort: 'Tagesanbruch.' Oder vielleicht auch 'Dämmerung' ... Und es hallt ständig wider wie ein Echo oder wie eine Glocke ..."

languages.text: « Bon sang ! » {n}Idira presse désespérément les doigts sur ses tempes.{/n} « V-Votre Seigneurie. Laissez-moi vous expliquer. J'essayais de voir l'avenir immédiat, et la vision m'a frappée si fort que j'en ai encore la tête qui tourne... Quelque chose de très étrange se dirige vers nous, et je ne parviens pas à comprendre ce dont il s'agit, quels que soient mes efforts. Je n'en tire qu'un seul et unique mot : "aube". Ou peut-être "aurore"... Et cela résonne à l'infini dans ma tête, comme une cloche... Mais alors, s'il s'agit bien de l'aube, pourquoi fait-il si noir ? »
languages.original_text: "Damn it!" {n}Idira presses her fingers to her temples in desperation.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Here's the thing. I was trying to see the immediate future, and it hit me so hard... my head is still spinning. Something very strange is heading our way, and I can't make out what it is, no matter how hard I try. A single word is all I can make out: 'daybreak.' Or maybe it's 'dawn'... And it's ringing and ringing like an echo, like a bell... But if it's daybreak, then why is it so dark?"

traits.locale_text: « Bon sang ! » {n}Idira presse désespérément les doigts sur ses tempes.{/n} « V-votre Seigneurie. Laissez-moi vous expliquer. J'essayais de voir l'avenir immédiat, et la vision m'a frappée si fort que j'en ai encore la tête qui tourne... Quelque chose de très étrange se dirige vers nous, et je ne parviens pas à comprendre ce dont il s'agit, quels que soient mes efforts. Je n'en tire qu'un seul et unique mot : "aube". Ou peut-être "aurore"... Et cela résonne à l'infini dans ma tête, comme une cloche... »

languages.text: «¡Maldita sea!». {n}Idira se lleva las manos a las sienes, desesperada.{/n} «M-mi{mf|lord|lady}, deje que le explique: estaba intentando ver el futuro inmediato y me impactó con tanta fuerza... la cabeza aún me da vueltas. Se aproxima algo muy extraño, y, por más que lo intente, no consigo identificar de qué se trata. Solo puedo entender una sola palabra: "alba". O "amanecer", tal vez... Y resuena una y otra vez, como un eco, como una campana... pero si es un amanecer, ¿por qué es tan oscuro?» .
languages.original_text: "Damn it!" {n}Idira presses her fingers to her temples in desperation.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Here's the thing. I was trying to see the immediate future, and it hit me so hard... my head is still spinning. Something very strange is heading our way, and I can't make out what it is, no matter how hard I try. A single word is all I can make out: 'daybreak.' Or maybe it's 'dawn'... And it's ringing and ringing like an echo, like a bell... But if it's daybreak, then why is it so dark?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Maldita sea!». {n}Idira se lleva las manos a las sienes, desesperada.{/n} «M-mi{mf|lord|lady}, deje que le explique: estaba intentando ver el futuro inmediato y me impactó con tanta fuerza... la cabeza aún me da vueltas. Se aproxima algo muy extraño, y, por más que lo intente, no consigo identificar de qué se trata. Solo puedo entender una sola palabra: "alba". O "amanecer", tal vez... Y resuena una y otra vez, como un eco, como una campana...".

languages.text: "Lanet olsun!" {n}İdira, çaresizlik içinde parmaklarını şakaklarına bastırıyor.{/n}"{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, mesele şu: Yakın geleceği görmeye çalışıyordum ama öyle bir vurdu ki... Başım hâlâ dönüyor. Çok garip bir şey bize doğru geliyor ve ne kadar uğraşırsam uğraşayım ne olduğunu çıkaramıyorum. Anlayabildiğim tek bir kelime var: 'Tan'... Belki de 'şafak'. Bir yankı gibi, çan gibi çınlayıp duruyor. İyi de madem tan, niye o kadar karanlık?"
languages.original_text: "Damn it!" {n}Idira presses her fingers to her temples in desperation.{/n} "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Here's the thing. I was trying to see the immediate future, and it hit me so hard... my head is still spinning. Something very strange is heading our way, and I can't make out what it is, no matter how hard I try. A single word is all I can make out: 'daybreak.' Or maybe it's 'dawn'... And it's ringing and ringing like an echo, like a bell... But if it's daybreak, then why is it so dark?"

Başım hâlâ dönüyor. Çok garip bir şey bize doğru geliyor ve ne kadar uğraşırsam uğraşayım ne olduğunu çıkaramıyorum. Anlayabildiğim tek bir kelime var: 'Tan'... Belki de 'şafak'. Bir yankı gibi, çan gibi çınlayıp duruyor. İyi de madem tan, niye o kadar karanlık?"
